name: SynthVR (alpha)
description:
Let your creativity loose and explore the depths of electronic sound!

This is a prerelease of SynthVR with limited functionality. Try it out and let me know your feedback. Get in touch at https://discord.gg/addfpyP or synthvr@42tones.com
